actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to identify certain routes in New Mexico as part of the Ports-to-Plains Corridor, a high priority corridor on the National Highway System.

summary.text: Amends the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to identify certain routes (United States Route 87 from the border between Texas and New Mexico to Raton, New Mexico, and Interstate Route 25 from Raton to Denver, Colorado) as part of the Ports-to-Plains Corridor, a high priority corridor of the National Highway System.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 to identify certain routes in New Mexico as part of the Ports-to-Plains Corridor, a high priority corridor on the National Highway System.
